attributes.action: Increase government funding for general and crisis mental health
attributes.additional_details: Increase of young deaths in the uk , youngsters who have requested help from metal health services and have been told to wait 2 weeks and have then gone ans taken their lives
attributes.background: We would like parliament or government to look into increasing funding for mental health

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Increased funding/support to Children and Young People's mental health services.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/558759

Increase funding for crisis and acute mental health services
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/559871

Immediately fund local services to prevent mental health pandemic
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557313
